title: Horseshoe Bend National Military Park: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       Permits Special Use Permits are avaiable, these permits require a $50:00 non-refundable fee and is payable thru money order or check, sorry but we are unable to process credit card payments. Reservations Interested in bringing an organized group or classroom to Horseshoe Bend NMP? Ranger led tours and living history demonstrations are available for groups with 10 or more visitors. Typically, we require at least two week notice to schedule special request programs if we have sufficient staff available. Please contact us at 256-234-7111 and be prepared to provide us with your group name, purpose for the visit, group size, at least two proposed visit dates, and an anticipated time of arrival. Go to our section For Teachers if you are planning an onsite visit for students, scouts, and similar youth groups. Please click on the link below for more informations on hosting a wedding in the park. Weddings at Horseshoe Bend National Military Park Picnic Areas Horseshoe Bend NMP has picnic shelters available near the Visitor Center on a first come, first served basis. Reservations are not accepted. Picnic tables are also located at the Highway 49 Boat Ramp at Miller Bridge. A Special Use Permit may be required for certain activities, typically those involving large numbers of people. Please email or call 256-234-7111 for more information.
